articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: ‘Great Australasian Eclipse’ Countdown Begins—Why You Need To Plan Now - Forbes
articles.description: A total solar eclipse will come to Australia and New Zealand on July 22, 2028, with totality as long as 5 minutes and 10 seconds. Here's where to be and why to plan now.
